DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy of collagen cross-linking for treatment of infectious keratitis.
DOC.brief_title: Collagen Cross-linking in Infectious Keratitis Trial
DOC.criteria: Evidence of corneal ulcer grade II or III (bacteria or fungal, or presumed bacterial or fungal) Age more than 6 year Patients can understand and can follow the study protocol Pregnancy by history or urine test Evidence of herpetic keratitis Evidence of corneal perforation Evidence of autoimmune disease Known allergy to study medication
